20101223023440.000|20101223023442.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS AND REPUBLICANS       
20101223023442.000|20101223023443.000|CC1|NEGOTIATED REALLY HARD THIS     
20101223023443.000|20101223023445.000|CC1|MORNING TO CUT DOWN THE OVERALL 
20101223023445.000|20101223023447.000|CC1|COST OF THE BILL TO $4 BILLION,

20101223023448.000|20101223023449.000|CC1|PROGRAM'S REQUIREMENTS.         
20101223023449.000|20101223023450.000|CC1|BRIAN?                          
20101223023450.000|20101223023452.000|CC1|>> GOING BACK, AND WHETHER YOU  
20101223023452.000|20101223023454.000|CC1|AGREE WITH THE LEGISLATION OR   
20101223023454.000|20101223023455.000|CC1|NOT, STARTING WITH HEALTH CARE, 
20101223023455.000|20101223023456.000|CC1|FINANCIAL REFORM, STIMULUS, IT  
20101223023456.000|20101223023458.000|CC1|HAS BEEN A MOUNTAIN THAT THEY   
20101223023458.000|20101223023500.000|CC1|HAVE PASSED, THOUGH LIKE EVERY  
20101223023500.000|20101223023501.000|CC1|SESSION, THERE'S A MOUNTAIN THEY
20101223023501.000|20101223023503.000|CC1|LEAVE BEHIND.                   
20101223023503.000|20101223023504.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WELL, IF YOU GO    
20101223023504.000|20101223023506.000|CC1|BACK TO THE 1960s, THAT'S THE   
20101223023506.000|20101223023508.000|CC1|LAST TIME WE SAW A CONGRESS THAT
20101223023508.000|20101223023510.000|CC1|COULD GET SO MUCH DONE AFFECTING
20101223023510.000|20101223023512.000|CC1|SO MANY AMERICAN LIVES.         
20101223023512.000|20101223023514.000|CC1|NOW, DEMOCRATS USE THEIR BIG    
20101223023514.000|20101223023515.000|CC1|MAJORITIES TO GET ACTION ON     
20101223023515.000|20101223023516.000|CC1|THINGS LIKE THE ECONOMIC        
20101223023516.000|20101223023517.000|CC1|STIMULUS, HEALTH CARE REFORM,   
20101223023517.000|20101223023518.000|CC1|FINANCIAL REGULATORY REFORM.    
20101223023518.000|20101223023520.000|CC1|CREDIT CARD REFORM.             
20101223023520.000|20101223023523.000|CC1|REMEMBER CASH FOR CLUNKERS?     
20101223023523.000|20101223023524.000|CC1|THE FAIR PAY ACT FOR WOMEN.     
20101223023524.000|20101223023526.000|CC1|AND THEN AFTER REPUBLICANS      
20101223023526.000|20101223023527.000|CC1|GAINED THEIR BIG STEAM IN       
20101223023527.000|20101223023529.000|CC1|NOVEMBER, THEY CAME BACK FOR THE
20101223023529.000|20101223023530.000|CC1|LAME DUCK SESSION, WHICH TURNED 
20101223023530.000|20101223023532.000|CC1|OUT TO BE SURPRISINGLY ABLE WITH
20101223023532.000|20101223023535.000|CC1|GOP COOPERATION ON A NUMBER OF  
20101223023535.000|20101223023536.000|CC1|THINGS, LIKE THE S.T.A.R.T.     
20101223023536.000|20101223023537.000|CC1|TREATY, THE REPEAL OF DON'T ASK,
20101223023537.000|20101223023539.000|CC1|DON'T TELL, THE TAX CUT

20101223023553.000|20101223023555.000|CC1|SIDES NOW, PRESIDENT AND

20101223023558.000|20101223023559.000|CC1|TOWN WITH THE NEW CONGRESS      
20101223023559.000|20101223023600.000|CC1|PRESENT.                        
20101223023600.000|20101223023601.000|CC1|SO THAT BRINGS US TO THE        
20101223023601.000|20101223023602.000|CC1|MODERATOR OF "MEET THE PRESS,"  
20101223023602.000|20101223023604.000|CC1|DAVID GREGORY.                  
20101223023604.000|20101223023606.000|CC1|DAVID, FIRST OFF, WHAT HAPPENED 
20101223023606.000|20101223023608.000|CC1|IN WASHINGTON TODAY, AND HOW    
20101223023608.000|20101223023610.000|CC1|DOES IT SET UP, IN FACT, PART   
20101223023610.000|20101223023612.000|CC1|TWO OF THE OBAMA PRESIDENCY?    
20101223023612.000|20101223023614.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE PRESIDENT HAS    
20101223023614.000|20101223023615.000|CC1|REPOSITIONED HIMSELF AS A LEADER
20101223023615.000|20101223023616.000|CC1|OF THIS COUNTRY, AS THE         
20101223023616.000|20101223023618.000|CC1|PRESIDENT.                      
20101223023618.000|20101223023619.000|CC1|I THINK HE QUICKLY TOOK A LESSON
20101223023619.000|20101223023621.000|CC1|FROM THE MIDTERMS AND SAID OKAY,
20101223023621.000|20101223023623.000|CC1|LOOK, I'M GOING TO DO SOME DEALS
20101223023623.000|20101223023625.000|CC1|HERE WITH THE REPUBLICANS ON TAX
20101223023625.000|20101223023626.000|CC1|CUTS TO CLEAR THE UNDERBRUSH    
20101223023626.000|20101223023628.000|CC1|POLITICALLY TO ALLOW SOME       
20101223023628.000|20101223023629.000|CC1|NEGOTIATIONS AND SOME SUCCESS ON
20101223023629.000|20101223023630.000|CC1|DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL,

20101223024244.000|20101223024246.000|CC1|FAKE PILLS, PLACEBOS, WITH SOME 
20101223024246.000|20101223024247.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE RESULTS.             
20101223024247.000|20101223024458.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101223024247.000|20101223024249.000|CC1|>>> THEN LATER, A WOMAN ALREADY 
20101223024249.000|20101223024251.000|CC1|MAKING A HUGE SACRIFICE, STILL  
20101223024251.000|20101223024252.000|CC1|WILLING TO GIVE JUST A LITTLE   
20101223024252.000|20101223024458.000|CC1|BIT MORE THIS CHRISTMAS SEASON. 
20101223024458.000|20101223024718.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101223024458.000|20101223024459.000|CC1|>>> WE'RE BACK TONIGHT WITH SOME
20101223024459.000|20101223024501.000|CC1|FASCINATING NEW RESEARCH ON WHAT
20101223024501.000|20101223024503.000|CC1|WE'VE ALL KNOWN AS THE PLACEBO  
20101223024503.000|20101223024504.000|CC1|EFFECT.                         
20101223024504.000|20101223024506.000|CC1|IT'S GENERALLY THOUGHT THAT     
20101223024506.000|20101223024508.000|CC1|DUMMY PILLS, OR SUGAR PILLS,    
20101223024508.000|20101223024509.000|CC1|WORK PRECISELY BECAUSE SO MUCH  
20101223024509.000|20101223024511.000|CC1|OF IT IS IN YOUR HEAD AND       
20101223024511.000|20101223024512.000|CC1|PATIENTS DON'T KNOW THEY'RE     
20101223024512.000|20101223024513.000|CC1|FAKE.                           
20101223024513.000|20101223024515.000|CC1|TONIGHT, RESULTS OF A NEW STUDY 
20101223024515.000|20101223024518.000|CC1|SUGGESTING THAT SECRECY MAY NOT 
20101223024518.000|20101223024520.000|CC1|HAVE TO BE PART OF FEELING      
20101223024520.000|20101223024521.000|CC1|BETTER WITHOUT ACTUAL MEDICINE. 
20101223024521.000|20101223024522.000|CC1|OUR REPORT FROM OUR CHIEF       
20101223024522.000|20101223024524.000|CC1|SCIENCE CORRESPONDENT ROBERT    
20101223024524.000|20101223024526.000|CC1|BAZELL.                         
20101223024526.000|20101223024527.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DIANE SANDBORN, A  
20101223024527.000|20101223024529.000|CC1|NURSE PRACTITIONER FOR HER      
20101223024529.000|20101223024530.000|CC1|ENTIRE CAREER, KNOWS ALL ABOUT  
20101223024530.000|20101223024532.000|CC1|THE PLACEBO EFFECT.             
20101223024532.000|20101223024533.000|CC1|STILL, SHE WAS SURPRISED HOW    
20101223024533.000|20101223024534.000|CC1|MUCH IT HELPED HER IN THIS      
20101223024534.000|20101223024536.000|CC1|LATEST STUDY.                   
20101223024536.000|20101223024537.000|CC1|>> THIS WAS LIKE A MIRACLE TO   
20101223024537.000|20101223024538.000|CC1|ME.                             
20101223024538.000|20101223024540.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MANY VIEW THE      
20101223024540.000|20101223024541.000|CC1|PLACEBO EFFECT AS THE STRONGEST 
20101223024541.000|20101223024542.000|CC1|EVIDENCE FOR THE MIND-BODY      
20101223024542.000|20101223024544.000|CC1|CONNECTION IN MEDICINE.         
20101223024544.000|20101223024545.000|CC1|IN STUDIES OF NEW DRUGS,        
20101223024545.000|20101223024547.000|CC1|PATIENTS DON'T KNOW WHETHER THEY
20101223024547.000|20101223024548.000|CC1|GET THE DRUG OR A PLACEBO, A    
20101223024548.000|20101223024549.000|CC1|DUMMY PILL.                     
20101223024549.000|20101223024550.000|CC1|OFTEN THOSE ON PLACEBO GET      
20101223024550.000|20101223024552.000|CC1|BETTER.                         
20101223024552.000|20101223024553.000|CC1|THE RESEARCHERS SAY THIS NEW    
20101223024553.000|20101223024555.000|CC1|STUDY TAKES THE PLACEBO EFFECT  
20101223024555.000|20101223024556.000|CC1|TO A HIGHER LEVEL.              
20101223024556.000|20101223024558.000|CC1|>> IT'S POSSIBLE TO HARNESS THE 
20101223024558.000|20101223024559.000|CC1|PLACEBO EFFECT WITHOUT FOOLING  
20101223024559.000|20101223024601.000|CC1|PATIENTS, WITHOUT DECEIVING     
20101223024601.000|20101223024602.000|CC1|PATIENTS.                       
20101223024602.000|20101223024604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: RESEARCHERS        
20101223024604.000|20101223024606.000|CC1|RECRUITED 80 PEOPLE SUFFERING   
20101223024606.000|20101223024608.000|CC1|FROM IRRITABLE BOWEL SYNDROME, A
20101223024608.000|20101223024610.000|CC1|CONDITION AFFECTING 10% TO 15%  
20101223024610.000|20101223024612.000|CC1|OF THE POPULATION, MOSTLY WOMEN.
20101223024612.000|20101223024613.000|CC1|IT'S KNOWN TO BE BROUGHT ON BY  
20101223024613.000|20101223024615.000|CC1|STRESS AND OTHER PSYCHOLOGICAL  
20101223024615.000|20101223024616.000|CC1|FACTORS.                        
20101223024616.000|20101223024617.000|CC1|>> THE TREATMENT OPTIONS ARE    
20101223024617.000|20101223024619.000|CC1|QUITE LIMITED IN IRRITABLE BOWEL
20101223024619.000|20101223024620.000|CC1|SYNDROME, WHICH MAKES IT VERY   
20101223024620.000|20101223024622.000|CC1|DIFFICULT FOR DOCTORS TO        
20101223024622.000|20101223024623.000|CC1|ADEQUATELY TREAT PATIENTS.      
20101223024623.000|20101223024625.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HALF THE VOLUNTEERS
20101223024625.000|20101223024626.000|CC1|GOT A BOTTLE OF PILLS ACTUALLY  
20101223024626.000|20101223024628.000|CC1|LABELED PLACEBO AND WERE TOLD TO
20101223024628.000|20101223024629.000|CC1|TAKE TWO A DAY.                 
20101223024629.000|20101223024631.000|CC1|THE OTHER HALF GOT NOTHING.     
20101223024631.000|20101223024634.000|CC1|AFTER THREE WEEKS, 59% OF THOSE 
20101223024634.000|20101223024637.000|CC1|TAKING THE PLACEBO IMPROVED.    
20101223024637.000|20101223024638.000|CC1|COMPARED TO 35% OF THOSE WHO GOT
20101223024638.000|20101223024639.000|CC1|NOTHING.                        
20101223024639.000|20101223024641.000|CC1|THE SCIENTISTS BELIEVE THAT SOME
20101223024641.000|20101223024642.000|CC1|PEOPLE GET BETTER SIMPLY FROM   
20101223024642.000|20101223024643.000|CC1|THE RITUAL OF INTERACTING WITH  
20101223024643.000|20101223024645.000|CC1|DOCTORS, INCLUDING GETTING      
20101223024645.000|20101223024646.000|CC1|PILLS.                          
20101223024646.000|20101223024649.000|CC1|SURVEYS SHOWED THAT HALF OF ALL 
20101223024649.000|20101223024649.000|CC1|DOCTORS ADMIT TO SOMETIMES      
20101223024649.000|20101223024650.000|CC1|GIVING PATIENTS A PLACEBO       
20101223024650.000|20101223024652.000|CC1|WITHOUT THEIR KNOWLEDGE.        
20101223024652.000|20101223024654.000|CC1|THIS RESEARCH SUGGESTS PLACEBOS 
20101223024654.000|20101223024657.000|CC1|MAY HAVE A WIDER APPLICATION AS 
20101223024657.000|20101223024657.000|CC1|HONEST TREATMENTS.

20101223025702.000|20101223025704.000|CC1|ARRIVE AT TRACY'S DOOR TO PICK  
20101223025704.000|20101223025704.000|CC1|UP THEIR GIFTS.                 
20101223025704.000|20101223025705.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE GOING TO LOVE IT.    
20101223025705.000|20101223025706.000|CC1|>> AWESOME.                     
20101223025706.000|20101223025708.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SPECIALIST WILLIAM 
20101223025708.000|20101223025710.000|CC1|GORSKI AND HIS WIFE HAVE A NEW  
20101223025710.000|20101223025713.000|CC1|9-MONTH-OLD BABY.
